text: Lazar Antsi-Polovsky () was a Russian actor, film director. Honored Artist of the RSFSR. == Selected filmography == * 1922 – Dolya ty russkaya, dolyushka zhenskaya * 1922 – The Miracle Maker * 1938 – If War Comes Tomorrow ==References== == External links == * Лазарь Анци-Половский on kino-teatr.ru * Category:Soviet male film actors Category:1888 births Category:1956 deaths
title: Lazar Antsi-Polovsky
